page.title: 09LOCAL HOUSING
page.content: This area is mainly woodland and heath land and is not very densely populated though the area is predominantly residential.The housing is a mixture of old and new the majority of which are detached.Many of these are individually styled and have large gardens.4% of these houses have pools and some have tennis courts.Modern developments tend to be 'tudor'style and 'non-estate' in character.Housing is very expensive and many celebrities and professional people make their homes here.The attractions of the area include the proximity to Heathrow,golf courses,Ascot race course,Windsor Park and London.The area is well served by major roads(A30)and motorways(M3,M4,M2 5)so it is popular with commuters.
